body_html:
I think I found the problem: in the compute function there was this line of code:

const_cast<float*>(context->input(1).flat().data())

If I change float to bool there it works. However, the execution of the program before never even got to this statement so it seems to be something that is set during compile time! (which I cannot read from this code)

body:
I think I found the problem: in the compute function there was this line of code:

const_cast<float*>(context->input(1).flat<float>().data()) 

If I change float to bool there it works. However, the execution of the program before never even got to this statement so it seems to be something that is set during compile time! (which I cannot read from this code)
